page.title: 13A Strange Custom
page.content: Mr{J.Oke}lives at the first cottage in April Lane and is employed as a part time farm labourer. He has the distinction of being the honorary Swimbridge spoon bender, a title bestowed upon him many years ago. He is probably the last spoon bender in the West Country.{ During the Summer {and Autumn, bearded Mr.Oke can be seen {winding his way through the lanes and {by-ways of North Devon on his ex. {G.P.O. bicycle dressed in the {tradional garb of shorts, bobble hat {and blue apron from isolated {farmsteads to village squares where {residents rush out in glee to have {their spoons bent back into shape {before the onset of the dark Winter {months when no respectable North Devon {family would wish it to be known that {they were the users of { out of shape pudding utensils.
